00026 #ifndef __MULTI_TRACK_CPP
00027 #define __MULTI_TRACK_CPP
00028 
00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00030 
00031 #include "MultiTrack.h"
00032 
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00034 
00035 #include "Iterator.h"
00036 
00037 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00038 MultiTrack::MultiTrack()
00039 {
00040     // nothing
00041 }
00042     
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00044 MultiTrack::MultiTrack(
00045         int channels,
00046         m_sample_count_type numSamples,
00047         m_rate_type samplingRate)
00048 {
00049     for (int i=0; i<channels; i++)
00050     {
00051         // create a blank track: (zero'd out)
00052         Track* t = new Track(numSamples, samplingRate, true);
00053         // add this blank track:
00054         add(t);
00055     }
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00060 MultiTrack::MultiTrack(MultiTrack& mt)
00061 {
00062     // copy every track from mt to this object.
00063     Iterator<Track*> it = mt.iterator();
00064     while (it.hasNext())
00065         add(new Track(*it.next()));
00066 }
00067 
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00069 MultiTrack& MultiTrack::operator=(MultiTrack& mt)
00070 {
00071     if ( this != &mt) // beware of self assignment
00072     {
00073         // delete any tracks:
00074         Iterator<Track*> it = iterator();
00075         while(it.hasNext())
00076             delete it.next();
00077         
00078         // clear this object
00079         clear();
00080         
00081         // copy every track from mt to this object.
00082         it = mt.iterator();
00083         while (it.hasNext())
00084             add(new Track(*it.next()));
00085     }
00086     
00087     return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00091 MultiTrack::~MultiTrack()
00092 {
00093         // delete any tracks:
00094         Iterator<Track*> it = iterator();
00095         while(it.hasNext())
00096             delete it.next();
00097         
00098         // clear this object
00099         clear();
00100 }
00101 
00102 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00103 void MultiTrack::composite(MultiTrack& mt, m_time_type startTime)
00104 {
00105 
00106     Iterator<Track*> it1 = iterator();
00107     Iterator<Track*> it2 = mt.iterator();
00108     
00109     while (it1.hasNext() && it2.hasNext())
00110     {
00111         it1.next()->composite(*it2.next(), startTime);
00112     }
00113     
00114     // we should do some warning if sizes aren't equal and such.
00115 }
